_header: Whoso that will all feats obtains
Note:
See Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 1976.
_description: The values of loving, ascribed to King Henry VIII — seven couplets

BLAdd31922.First Lines: Who so that wyll all feattes optayneIn loue he must be withowt dysdayne…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …grett pyte it ware loue to compellwith dysdayne bothe falce and subtell
BLAdd31922.Note: Notation only on f. 38v, text on f. 39.
